mapper.insert: insert into member_tr_channel_ext (member_id, agent_member_id, agent_real_name, cert_type, cert_no, province, city, area, address, channel_source, channel_source_extention, extention) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{agentRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelSourceExtention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extention,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update member_tr_channel_ext set agent_member_id = #{agentMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, agent_real_name = #{agentRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cert_type = #{certType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cert_no = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_source = #{channelSource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel_source_extention = #{channelSourceExtention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, extention = #{extention,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select member_id, agent_member_id, agent_real_name, cert_type, cert_no, province, city, area, address, channel_source, channel_source_extention, extention from member_tr_channel_ext where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
